sentences.sCn: 慈善机构敦促迅速采取行动。

sentences.sContent: ...we can change how often we receive the distracting notifications that trigger our urge to check...
...The Senate bill would create an independent commission to monitor the pilot programs and recommend changes in Medicare's payment policies to urge providers to adopt reforms that work...
...psychologists coined the term "workplace telepressure" to describe an employee's urge to immediately respond to emails and engage in obsessive thoughts about returning an email to one's boss...
...The urge to quantify is embedded in our society...
...The urge to explore space is just the opposite...

synos.tran: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力

trans.tranCn: 鼓励；推进，催促；竭力主张，强烈要求
trans.tranOther: to strongly suggest that someone does something
